attributes.Name: Billy's Bar
attributes.eventDescription: Are you ready for Louby Lou's exciting Spooktacular? Let's have some spooky giggles and fun at Billy's Bar (Manchester Road Cafe & Sandwich Bar)! Food, drinks and snacks available at the bar!

attributes.Name: The Delph
attributes.eventDescription: Let's get our Spook on! Louby Lou's Spooktacular comes to The Delph on Halloween day! I can't wait to share some spooky giggles and fun! Don't miss out this halloween as tickets are selling fast!

attributes.Name: The Point
attributes.eventDescription: Calling all Mums n Tots! Fancy a little morning laughter? With music, games, magic and giggles, Louby Lou will make your morning shine bright! Enjoy a wonderful atmosphere at the beautiful Astley Point!
